title.narrative: Technical Assistance Facility to catalyse private investment in sustainable land use and reduced deforestation

description.narrative: This activity (Technical Assistance Facility to catalyse private investment in sustainable land use and reduced deforestation) is a component of Investments in Forests and Sustainable Land Use reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £96,799,995. This component benefits Developing countries, unspecified, and works in the following sector(s): Forestry policy and administrative management. , with the following implementing partners: Crown Agents Bank, Palladium International Ltd (UK). The start date is 26-02-2015 and the end date is 31-12-2023.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Forestry - Economic Affairs - Forestry - policy, planning and administration
